member.postal_address: Office 205, 47A Evelpidon & 33 Lefkados Str., GR-113 62 Athens, Greece

shortcv.p: Korina Diamanti holds a first degree (BA Hons) in Business Administration (1997) and an MSc in Financial Management (1999) from Middlesex University. She is currently a PhD candidate in the Department of Management Science and Technology of Athens School of Economics & Business (AUEB) and a research associate at ELTRUN. She has participated in two European funded projects that were completed successfully (GEMINI and CEBOS). Her current research interests involve the areas of global strategic benchmarking and knowledge transfer through Information & Communication Technologies. She speaks fluently Greek (native), English and French and has a very basic knowledge of Spanish. She had worked for more than a year at a stock-brokerage firm in Athens as asset management assistant, as shop assistant and sales manager in Agrinio, and research assistant in the Centre of Interdisciplinary Strategic Management Research of Middlesex University in London, indicatively.
